name: Black Magga

specials.name: Breath of Madness
specials.description:
% can exhale a cloud of foul-smelling, poisonous breath once every minute. This cloud of black smoke fills a 60-foot cone. All creatures in the area become Confused for 1 minute as per the Confusion spell and Stupefied and Clumsy for 1 round as per the Befuddle spell (DC33 Will save). 
This breath weapon cannot be used while underwater.

specials.name: Warp Dimensions
specials.description: Trigger: Teleportation effect within 300 ft. %a’s presence distorts the dimensions. Effect: Any creature that attempts to utilize a teleportation effect while within 300 feet of % must succeed at a DC 33 Fortitude save or the teleport effect fails. On a critical failure become sickened 1.

specials.name: Transdimensional Tentacles
specials.description: %’s tentacles allow her to see into and infiltrate the Ethereal Plane and the Plane of Shadow while she is on the Material Plane. This allows her not only to be aware of these planes and the creatures there, but also to shift her tentacles through these planes to attack their inhabitants. She can even phase her tentacles in and out of existence, effectively reaching through walls and other solid barriers to attack foes on the other side, provided that area is not warded by a dimensional lock or similar effect. She can grapple foes with her tentacles normally, but cannot pull grappled foes or objects through planes as her tentacles shift between them.

specials.name: Taste of Oblivion
specials.description: When a % damages with its jaws, the target receives a temporary vision of Lamashtu and their impending death. The target must succeed at a DC 35 Fortitude save or become drained 2 and doomed 1. On a critical success, the target becomes temporarily immune to the energy drain for 24 hours.

specials.name: Storm of Tentacles
specials.description: % makes up to four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the %'s multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all of its attacks.

specials.name: Tentacle Sweep
specials.description: % makes a single attack roll and compares that to the AC of everyone within reach. Anyone hit is knocked prone.  This counts as 2 attacks toward the %'s multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes its sweep.

specials.name: Uprooting Tentacles
specials.description: % makes up to three attacks rolls, each against a different target. Anyone hit is automatically grabbed and flung 40ft into the air and lands up to 40ft in a random direction. These attacks count toward the %'s multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all of its attacks.

description:
This enormous creature’s serpentine neck supports a leering reptilian head—its body is a wriggling mass of eyes and tentacles.

Initial encounter:
As she has only just awoken from several hundred years hibernation % is not yet at the height of her powers. Apply multiple weak templates to keep her effective level within 4, or at worst 5 of the party.

% is having her worse day in millenia. She has just been rudely woken up from several hundred years hibernation, by ogres banging on the dam, and which if left unchecked could destroy her home. While attempting to sort that out part of the dam collapsed under her and she fell over 200 feet to the valley below taking serious damage. Now she has spotted a church to an opposed deity. This is the perfect outlet for her annoyance.

Tactics: % focusses on destroying the church and ignores anyone and anything else unless they attack or block her. If anyone stands up to her and lives through a round of attacks, or she takes 10 or more points of damage from any source, or she suffers a negative status effect, this is enough to snap her out of her anger, and she retreats to the depths of Claybottom Lake to plan her revenge and recharge.
spells: At will: Anathematic Reprisal (anathema: attempt to treat a mental illness or deformity, provide succor to Lamashtu’s enemies). Dimensional Anchor (1/day), Read Omens (1/day).

perception.note: all-around vision, darkvision 60 ft, transdimensional tentacles, see invisibility

languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Infernal, Thassilonian
